file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-96-01-02 - APU OIL FILTER ELEMENT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU OIL FILTER ELEMENT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to replace the APU oil filter element. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU APU OIL FILTER ELEMENT - REPLACE- 49-96-01-960-801-A ♦ T-62T-40C14 MENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-96-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-96-01-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C14 2. APU OIL FILTER ELEMENT - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) The oil filter element is installed externally, on the left side of the gearbox assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-42-00/100 - AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 49-13-00-910-802-A/200 APU - START C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313CL APU cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-02-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the APU FUEL SOV circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 49-96-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Put the ladder in position and open APU access panel 313CL (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100). (4) Put a container below the gearbox assembly to catch oil. J. Discard of Oil Filter Element SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the oil filter element. Refer to the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand engine manual T-62T-40C14 (P/N 4504112), 49-92-02. (2) Discard the old oil filter element. (3) Install a new oil filter element. Refer to the latest revision of Hamilton Sundstrand engine manual T-62T-40C14 (P/N 4504112), 49-92-02. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the container from the gearbox assembly. (2) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU FUEL SOV circuit breaker. (3) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. (4) Operate the APU ( AMM TASK 49-13-00-910-802-A/200) and examine the oil filter element for leaks. (5) Close APU access panel 313CL (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100) and remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 49-96-01 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
